summary: Tiered plans designed for each stage of an ecommerce business, from starting with real data to full operational control.

billing.notes: The website offers a monthly/annual toggle. Prices shown here reflect the monthly plans.

tiers.tagline: To get started with real data

tiers.name: Growth
tiers.tagline: For stores that want to grow

deep_context.design_principle: Plans are structured to match the growth stages of a LATAM ecommerce brand: starting with basic visibility, then scaling paid traffic, then adding multichannel and cashflow visibility, and finally full-stack control with cohorts, LTV and consulting.
deep_context.free_plan_purpose: Remove friction so stores can start seeing real numbers without cost up to 50 orders.
deep_context.trial_note: Growth, Scale and Pro plans include a 7-day free trial and can be cancelled anytime, as stated on the website.
